Project Members

  • Ethan Hickman

    PhD Student

    Ethan is a PhD student in the computer science department at UMD and is advised by Xiaodi Wu. His research focuses on developing algorithms and techniques for near-term quantum devices.

  • Jiaqi Leng

    PhD Student

    Jiaqi Leng is an applied math PhD student at UMD advised by Xiaodi Wu. He aims to reinterpret scientific computing in the quantum era.

  • Joseph Li

    PhD Student

    Joseph is a doctoral student in computer science, advised by Prof. Xiaodi Wu. He is interested in the theory and practically relevant applications of quantum information and computation. He is also broadly interested in algorithms, machine learning, and graphics.

  • Xiaodi Wu

    Principle Investigator

    Professor Wu is the PI for this research.
